commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What kind of presents should I get everyone?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Bath powders and sweets, tableware, accessories... They are all very tempting.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I think sweets are the way to go, zura! I'll get us some red, white, and yellow bean paste sweet buns so we can have as much of whichever ones we want!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That is WAY more than you should be buying!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: They have skincare products over here. Face wash, lotion, face masks... This one says it's made with hot spring water for silky smooth skin, Nico-chi.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm sold. I'll take the whole box.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: That is way more than you should be buying, zura.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: These pouches come in all sorts of designs! They're so cute! I could buy one of each and give them to the whole Aqours crew. Gosh, but these handkerchiefs are way cute, too.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: If I get sweets, we could snack on them during practice breaks. If I get small accessories, they could be used day-to-day. What to choose, what to choose...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I think I'll go with this set of bath powders. One for home, and one for everyone in the club.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That way you can feel like you have a hot spring in your own home. Are you planning on taking a bath with Haruka?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Giggle* Sure am!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's no use, I can't choose. Did ya decide on what you're getting, Nozomi?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I already know what my present's going to be.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Wait, really? What is it? The snacks? The handkerchiefs? The key chains?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Chuckle* It's this right here.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hm? That's just your phone.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I don't think there's anything that could top this. My present is...

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: This picture!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A picture? Hey! Th-Th-That's...!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What's got you all worked up over h... Wait, whaaat?! Nozomi, why do you have that?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Pretty great, huh? It's a picture of when you and Chika-chi were crying after you got lost looking for that hot spring.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What?! When did you even take that, zura? I didn't even notice.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh ho, now there's something you don't see every day. You've got a knack for photography, Nozomi.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I agree. You wouldn't be able to get a present like this on any other trip.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: My face is totally drenched in tears... Did I seriously look like that?! *Whimper* I'm so embarrassed!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: How dare you take a picture like this?! Delete it! Delete it right now!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: No way. You two worried us sick. I want this to be a reminder to us all so we never do something so reckless and dangerous ever again.

commands.speaker: Nico, Chika
commands.line: Urgh...

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Nozomi, I want a copy of that too.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I'd like to have such a lovely memorial keepsake as well.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Me three, zura!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Sure, I'll send it to you all later. Make sure you send it to everyone else in Aqours and Nijigasaki too.

commands.speaker: Nico, Chika
commands.line: NOOOO!
